description: This script automates the setup and startup of a development server environment in a Continuous Integration context. It installs dependencies, sets environment variables, chooses between static and React development modes, starts the appropriate server, waits for health checks, and handles graceful shutdown signals.

methods.name: start_static
methods.description: Starts a static server using the static-server.js script and returns its process ID.

methods.name: start_react
methods.description: Starts a React development server using react-scripts with low-memory configurations and returns its process ID.

methods.name: graceful_exit
methods.description: Handles SIGTERM and SIGINT signals to perform a graceful shutdown of the server processes.
